features: MAXIMUM PORTABILITY — Designed for ease of use with a 12-foot power cord and a 28-inch attachable extension hose that provides added reach for those hard to get to places
6 VERSATILE ACCESSORIES — Equipped for steam cleaning jobs in and around your home including a brass brush jet nozzle extension hose measuring cup nylon brushes and more
QUICK HEAT UP TIME — The 6-ounce water tank heats up in 3 minutes and provides up to 8 minutes of steam

CHEMICAL-FREE CLEANING — Naturally deep clean without the use of harsh chemicals using hot pressured steam to eliminate grease, grime, and stains from a wide range of surfaces including ceramic tile grout granite appliances grills autos and more

SUPERIOR SUPPORT — When you choose a Steamfast product, you’re investing in superior performance and design that will deliver total satisfaction. If not, we’ll replace it, for 2 years. Supported by a customer service team based in Andover, KS.
Built to meet U. S. voltage requirements Certified safety-tested and warrantied for use only in the U. S.
body.description: Product Description The Steamfast SF-210 Everyday Steam Cleaner places the power and convenience of steam cleaning in your hand. Lightweight and portable, the Everyday Steam Cleaner fits all of the benefits of steam cleaning into a form that is easy to use and store. The Everyday Steam Cleaner is ready in 3 minutes or less, with the power of steam to clean a wide variety of surfaces. The SF-210 comes with multiple accessories to make common cleaning tasks simple, and an extension hose for hard-to-reach areas of your home. From kitchen counters to bathroom tiles, blast away dirt and grime throughout your home with the Everyday Steam Cleaner. From the Manufacturer IMPORTANT INTERNATIONAL DISCLAIMER: This item is built to meet U.S. voltage requirements and may not function properly when used in conjunction with external devices that alter or convert voltage or frequency of electricity. Improper use or shipping the product outside the U.S. will void all warranties.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SF-210 Everyday Steam Cleaner The SteamFast SF-210 Everyday Steam Cleaner places the power and convenience of steam cleaning in your hand. Lightweight and portable, the Everyday Steam Cleaner fits all of the benefits of steam cleaning into a form factor that is easy to use and store. The Everyday Steam Cleaner is ready in 3 minutes or less, harnessing the natural, effective power of steam to clean a wide variety of surfaces. The SF-210 comes with multiple accessories to make common cleaning tasks simple. From kitchen counters to bathroom tiles, blast away dirt and grime throughout your home with the Everyday Steam Cleaner.

Easy-fill tank. A 6 oz. water boiler heats up in 3 minutes and produces over 8 minutes of continuous, powerful steam. On-demand steam control. A conveniently-located steam-on-demand button activates the flow of steam. Powerful steam cleaner. With a variety of attachable brushes, the SF-210 becomes a fully versatile handheld steam cleaner for blasting tough dirt and grime from surfaces all around your home. Attachable extension hose. For those hard-to-reach areas, the SF-210 comes equipped with a 28-inch attachable extension hose.

The SF-210 is perfect for cleaning tile, countertops, grills, sinks, toilets, toys, and much more. Perfectly clean home. You want things to look clean and fresh, without having to use a lot of products. Steamfast is the chemical-free, multi-use, low wear-and-tear way to keep things looking their best. No surface too big or too small Your home is made of many different things. Cleaning them shouldn't be a chore. Our all-natural steam care solutions are a chemical-free way to clean and freshen your home. The SF-210 Everyday Steam Cleaner comes equipped with: SF-210 Steam Cleaner Nylon Utility Brush Brass Utility Brush Measuring Cup Large Nylon Brush Jet Nozzle Extension Hose

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s inexpensive, but powerful.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to defrost a frozen fridge evaporator and it worked flawlessly. It also defrosted the frozen drain line and the water supply to the ice maker. It came with a hose and several other attachments, plus a 10 foot power cord. I even cleaned my truck seats with it! This is a hidden gem! Definitely a good product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2012
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for small jobs!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to use to clean out my pets' food and water bowls. I didn't like the idea of using soap (would that taste remain?) and I wanted something that would disinfect the bowls. My animals all use stainless steel bowls. Well, at first it really scared the cats. It sounded like a really angry hiss. They are used to it now and I not only use it to clean their bowls, but also to clean my kitchen sink and countertops. Yes, it does produce water (it is called STEAM!) but it does a great job in cleaning and is very portable. I used it also to clean the tiles in my bathroom and ended up cleaning the shower doors. There was always a problem with hard water stains and I was very reluctant to use chemicals that advice you to use gloves.The steamer did the trick. I applied steam to the doors, used a squeegee and lo and behold, my doors are free of those annoying stains. The steam lasts about 10 minutes, but I didn't buy this little guy to clean everything. I might get a bigger steamer for that, but I would definitely recommend this steamer for anyone who has lots of small jobs. It is also a great way to clean and sanitize pet food bowls.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars works great. i would buy it again
reviews.reviewText: Works great for the things I needed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Machine works great brushes ok
reviews.reviewText: The machine works very well but the plastic brish heads melt within the first few blasts of steam. After about 30 minutes of use they were useless!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don’t waste your time
reviews.reviewText: I took my simple Amazon streamer to a second home. I jumped online and purchased this unit. HUGE mistake! This is a horrible design and doesn’t work well. Water pours out the spout and my finger was sore the first 5 min. I sent it back and ordering another of the one I first had.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great starter for steam cleaning. Easy to use. For me it is a great way to get my kitchen, bathroom and recliners clean without chemicals. I have also used it in my car! Saves money on expenses of professional job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for short term cleaning.
reviews.reviewText: It cleans vinyl flooring, brick and aluminum entry, window screens, everything I tried. It only cleans for a few minutes before needing a minute or so to reheat the water (6 ounces max.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I read through a lot of negative reviews so I wasn't sure what to expect. This thing works great. Steams for about 5 minutes before running out of water, but it's a handheld steamer... If you want 30 minutes of uninterrupted steaming you shouldn't buy something so compact. It's easy to refill and only takes about 1-2 minutes to heat up.For $37 I think it works great so far. Refilled and steamed about 10 times so far with 0 problems.

reviews.reviewTitle: First use exceeded all my expectations
reviews.reviewText: I bought this steamer hoping I could use it in the house showers; well I haven’t done that yetToday, however I used the steamer to clean our patio cushions before putting them away for the winter. And OMG am I impressed. Stains gone! Dirt gone! The one attachment cleaned up loose leaf debris.I can’t wait to steam the next thing

me gustó mucho, la calidad excelente el cable es bastante largo, instrucciones claras y con una porcion de agua puedes limpiar bastante, solo tener cuidado al abrir ya que el vapor puede salir, por otro lado recomiendo secar todo lo que se limpie ya que el dejarlo humedo producira hongo.
Does what it says easy to use.

reviews.reviewTitle: El vaporizador es bueno... los accesorios no tanto
reviews.reviewText: Mi primera impresión al desempacar el producto es que el cuerpo del vaporizador esta bien construido, con materiales de buena calidad, pero los accesorios se perciben de calidad inferior con plásticos mal terminados e imperfecciones en los bordes. Ya en uso se aprecia que genera vapor en forma rápida pero intermitente, es decir, después de unos cuantos disparos de vapor debes esperar a que obtenga una nueva cantidad suficiente para continuar la labor, por lo que puede resultar un poco tedioso. El vapor es buena ayuda en las labores de limpieza, pero de ninguna manera sustituye el uso de agentes limpiadores y cepillos.
Me gusta que tiene buena potencia y aunque se le pone poca agua, el vapor dura mucho. No pesa, es fácil de manejar y el cable es bastante largo.
